application_type_full: Outline planning permission: Some matters reserved
description: REDEVELOPMENT OF SITE - PROVISION OF A MAXIMUM OF 121 RESIDENTIAL UNITS  (WITH A MAXIMUM RESIDENTIAL DENSITY OF 259 HABITABLE ROOMS PER HECTARE) WITH ASSOCIATED PARKING PROVISION; ERECTION OF BUSINESS UNITS (USE WITHIN CLASS B1(B) AND B1(C)) WITH A TOTAL FLOORSPACE OF NOT LESS THAN 6,000 SQ.M AND NOT MORE THAN 8,640 SQ.M (OUTLINE PLANNING APPLICATION WITH MEANS OF ACCESS ONLY TO BE DETERMINED AT THIS STAGE).Reserve matters approved 14.8.06 B1 6970m2 & 121 C3 units (06/P0883/8.)
